overview_summary: All three profiled neighbors have no documented public stance on development or clean energy. None hold notable community positions, indicating low individual influence in local affairs.

neighbors.name: Benjamin Hayes Smith and Jada Katherine Bu
neighbors.claims: Benjamin Hayes Smith and Jada Katherine Bu are listed as owners of an Anderson County parcel but have no readily available public biographical or civic information ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/#:~:text=Research%20Assistance%3A)). No references to either individual were found in local meeting minutes or news reports regarding development or energy projects ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=,back%20to%20previous%20reassessment%20periods)) ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=The%20Anderson%20County%20Lien%20Search,process%20includes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: With no known stance or public profile, approach them informally via direct outreach, sharing project facts and inviting any questions or concerns.

neighbors.name: Russell R. Roberts
neighbors.claims: Russell R. Roberts owns property in Anderson County with no indication of active civic or leadership roles ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/#:~:text=Research%20Assistance%3A)). Public record searches yielded no evidence of Roberts speaking out on local development or renewable energy issues ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=,back%20to%20previous%20reassessment%20periods)) ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=The%20Anderson%20County%20Lien%20Search,process%20includes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage one-on-one by providing information about the project and asking for feedback, as he has not voiced opinions publicly.

neighbors.name: Carmen Jose Rojas Noyola and Celsa Rojas
neighbors.claims: Carmen Jose Rojas Noyola and Celsa Rojas jointly own a parcel in Anderson County, but little else is documented about them in accessible public sources ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/#:~:text=Research%20Assistance%3A)). They have made no known public comments or appearances regarding local development proposals ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=,back%20to%20previous%20reassessment%20periods)) ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=The%20Anderson%20County%20Lien%20Search,process%20includes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Outreach should be done in a personal, community-oriented manner (possibly with Spanish-language materials if needed), focusing on listening to any concerns since their views are not publicly known.
